entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Puvirnituq
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 24.
